mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum , noticeno, noticetitle, noticecontent, noticedate FROM notice ORDER BY noticedate DESC) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{curPage}-1)*5)+1 AND #{curPage}*5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeno, noticetitle, noticecontent, noticedate) values(seq_notice.nextVal, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET noticetitle=#{noticeTitle}, noticecontent=#{noticeContent} WHERE noticeno=#{noticeNo}
